verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: brought] [ARG1: the world 's two biggest economies] [ARG2: to the brink of a trade war] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARGM-MNR: by announcing a 25 percent tariff on up to $ 50 billion in Chinese imports to take effect July 6] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] brought the world 's two biggest economies to the brink of a trade war Friday by [V: announcing] [ARG1: a 25 percent tariff on up to $ 50 billion in Chinese imports] [ARGM-PNC: to take effect July 6] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] brought the world 's two biggest economies to the brink of a trade war Friday by announcing [ARG1: a 25 percent tariff on up to $ 50 billion in Chinese imports] to [V: take] [ARG2: effect] [ARGM-TMP: July 6] .
